  3. Progress bar

Progress bar

Use the HTML5 progress element. Examples are provided in the Progress polyfill working examples.

Table of contents

  • Description
  • Basic progress bar
  • Text on progress bar
  • Coloured progress bar
  • Striped progress bar
  • Animated progress bar
  • Stacked progress bar

Related

Design guide

  • Progress polyfill - Design guide

Description

Provide up-to-date feedback on the progress of a workflow or action with simple yet flexible progress bars.

Cross-browser compatibility

Progress bars use CSS3 transitions and animations to achieve some of their effects. These features are not supported in Internet Explorer 9 and below or older versions of Firefox. Opera 12 does not support animations.

Basic progress bar

Default progress bar.

60% Complete 
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="60" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 60%;">
    <span class="wb-inv">60% Complete</span>
  </div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Text on progress bar

Remove the .wb-inv class from within the progress bar to show a visible percentage. For low percentages, consider adding a min-width to ensure the label's text is fully visible.

60% 
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="60" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 60%;">
    60%
  </div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Coloured progress bar

Progress bars use some of the same button and alert classes for consistent styles.

40% Complete (success)
20% Complete
60% Complete (warning)
80% Complete (danger) 
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-success" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="40" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 40%">
    <span class="wb-inv">40% Complete (success)</span>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-info" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="20" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 20%">
    <span class="wb-inv">20% Complete</span>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-warning" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="60" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 60%">
    <span class="wb-inv">60% Complete (warning)</span>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-danger" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="80" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 80%">
    <span class="wb-inv">80% Complete</span>
  </div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Striped progress bar

Uses a gradient to create a striped effect. Not available in IE8.

40% Complete (success)
20% Complete
60% Complete (warning)
80% Complete (danger) 
<div class="progress progress-striped">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-success" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="40" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 40%">
    <span class="wb-inv">40% Complete (success)</span>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="progress progress-striped">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-info" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="20" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 20%">
    <span class="wb-inv">20% Complete</span>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="progress progress-striped">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-warning" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="60" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 60%">
    <span class="wb-inv">60% Complete (warning)</span>
  </div>
</div>
<div class="progress progress-striped">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-danger" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="80" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 80%">
    <span class="wb-inv">80% Complete (danger)</span>
  </div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Animated progress bar

Add .active to .progress-striped to animate the stripes right to left. Not available in all versions of IE.

45% Complete
<div class="progress progress-striped active">
  <div class="progress-bar" role="progressbar" aria-valuenow="45" aria-valuemin="0" aria-valuemax="100" style="width: 45%">
    <span class="wb-inv">45% Complete</span>
  </div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)

Stacked progress bar

Place multiple bars into the same .progress to stack them.

35% Complete (success)
20% Complete (warning)
10% Complete (danger) 
<div class="progress">
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-success" style="width: 35%">
    <span class="wb-inv">35% Complete (success)</span>
  </div>
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-warning" style="width: 20%">
    <span class="wb-inv">20% Complete (warning)</span>
  </div>
  <div class="progress-bar progress-bar-danger" style="width: 10%">
    <span class="wb-inv">10% Complete (danger)</span>
  </div>
</div>

Use when

(Info goes here)

Do not use when

(Info goes here)
